Value: CV Check Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, provides screening and verification services to for organisations, employers, and individuals in Australia and New Zealand. It offers national police checks; employment reference checks; employment and qualification checks; VEVO visa and work entitlement checks; credit, financial, and business checks; traffic and license checks; and international checks, as well as predictive psychometric assessments services. The company also provides SaaS-based workforce management and compliance technology systems. CV Check Ltd was incorporated in 2004 and is based in Osborne Park, Australia.
Building E Level 2 355 Scarborough Beach Road
